channel.title: Item requirements - Project Insanity
channel.description: My range is messed up on my server but item requirements is true. I can equip all items at level 1 range except magic bow. What's the quickest way to add them all without having to do them individually? Any suggestions?

item.title: Item requirements - Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

Or look at how it’s done for that Magic Shortbow. But if you have it, then sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Item requirements - Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

If you want them to require the correct levels, i.e. willow bow, 20 range, maple, 30 etc… You will have to do them manually, or rip them from another source.

If you’re not bothered, put them all into an array and just loop through the array assigning a requirement value.

Read full topic
